title: Sarah Josepha Hale: Intellectual, Editor, Mother
itunes:title: Sarah Josepha Hale: Intellectual, Editor, Mother
description: On this episode, Melanie Kirkpatrick joins Mark Bauerlein to discuss her new book, "Lady Editor: Sarah Josepha Hale and the Making of the Modern American Woman."
content:encoded: On this episode, Melanie Kirkpatrick joins Mark Bauerlein to discuss her new book, "Lady Editor: Sarah Josepha Hale and the Making of the Modern American Woman."
